sentence.Network_en: the sudden realization of what she had done
sentence.Network_cn: 突然意识到她自己究竟干了些什么

sentence.Network_en: This realization of our dreams surpassed even our wildest expectations.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们梦想的实现甚至超越了我们最大胆的估计.

sentence.Network_en: We shall gladly lend every effort in our power toward its realization.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们将乐意为它的实现而竭尽全力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 实现接口的类和接口之间的关系称为实现（realization）。接口既可用概念建模，也可用物理实体建模。

自动化专业英语词汇表 ... 实时遥测 real time telemetry 可实现性,能实现性 realizability 感受野 receptive field.

entry.def: If you realize that something is true, you become aware of that fact or understand it.

example.ex: As soon as we realised something was wrong, we moved the children away...
example.tran: 我们刚意识到有什么不对劲就把孩子转移了。

example.ex: People don't realize how serious this recession has actually been...
example.tran: 人们没有意识到这次经济衰退事实上有多严重。

entry.tran: （希望、心愿或恐惧）实现，成为现实，发生
entry.def: If your hopes, desires, or fears are realized, the things that you hope for, desire, or fear actually happen.

example.ex: Straightaway our worst fears were realised...
example.tran: 我们最恐惧的事情一下发生了。

example.ex: Those are our hopes; we are starting this clinical trial to investigate whether those hopes will be realised.
example.tran: 那些就是我们的希望；我们正在开展这些临床试验以调查那些希望是否可以实现。

entry.def: When someone realizes a design or an idea, they make or organize something based on that design or idea.

example.ex: Various textile techniques will be explored to realise design possibilities...
example.tran: 将尝试和探索纺织技巧来把这些设计变为现实。

example.ex: The kaleidoscopic quality of the book is brilliantly realised on stage.
example.tran: 该书包罗万象、精彩纷呈的特质在舞台上得到了精彩再现。

entry.def: If someone or something realizes their potential, they do everything they are capable of doing, because they have been given the opportunity to do so.

example.ex: The support systems to enable women to realize their potential at work are seriously inadequate...
example.tran: 使妇女在工作中发挥潜力的支持体系严重不足。

example.ex: I think probably that the laser has not realised the potential that was expected of it in that domain.
example.tran: 我想可能激光在那个领域并没有充分发挥其潜力。

entry.def: If something realizes a particular amount of money when it is sold, that amount of money is paid for it.

example.ex: A selection of correspondence from P G Wodehouse realised £ 1,232.
example.tran: P.G.沃德豪斯的书信选集卖了1,232英镑。

means.word_mean: 1. coming to understand something clearly and distinctly;

sentences.sentence: "a growing realization of the risk involved"
"a sudden recognition of the problem he faced"
"increasing recognition that diabetes frequently coexists with other chronic diseases"

means.word_mean: 2. making real or giving the appearance of reality
3. a musical composition that has been completed or enriched by someone other than the composer
4. a sale in order to obtain money (as a sale of stock or a sale of the estate of a bankrupt person) or the money so obtained
5. the completion or enrichment of a piece of music left sparsely notated by a composer
6. something that is made real or concrete;

sentences.sentence: "the victory was the realization of a whole year's work"

auth_sentence.content: C, Leptis Magna is a unique artistic realization in the domain of urban planning.
auth_sentence.res_content: C, Leptis Magna is a unique artistic realization in the domain of urban planning.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: C, Leptis Magna is a unique artistic realization in the domain of urban planning.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,由-ize+-ation组成,"……化"或"发展过程"

stems_affixes.word_buile: central中心的,中央的+ization……化→n.集中,中央集权化
industrial工业的,产业的+ization……化→n.工业化,产业化
organ器官,组织+ization……化→n.组织,团体,机构

Sentence.sentence: It will not help the realization of racial and economic equality.

sentences.en: I was hit by the realization that I might die.
sentences.cn: 我认识到我可能要死了。

sentences.en: The realization that the murderer must have been a close friend came as a shock.
sentences.cn: 意识到杀人凶手一定是个密友，大家都很震惊。

sentences.en: The realization that she was gone was like a knife thrust.
sentences.cn: 意识到她已走了让人心像刀扎了一样。

sentences.en: He came to the realization that he would never make a good teacher.
sentences.cn: 他逐渐认识到自己永远不会成为好老师。

sentences.en: It seemed that the realization of his life’s dream oppressed him with overjoy.
sentences.cn: 夙愿得偿似乎使他欣喜若狂。

sentences.en: Let’s pull together for the early realization of the four modernizations.
sentences.cn: 为了早日实现四个现代化,让我们齐心协力地干吧。

sentences.en: This realization of our dreams surpassed even our wildest expectations.
sentences.cn: 我们梦想的实现甚至超越了我们最大胆的估计。
